page.description: Read bytes from file into string.

argument.name: Length
argument.description: The number of characters to read.

page.discussion: The .READ() method retrieves a specified Number_of_Characters from a file starting at the current file offset. The .READ() method returns a string of the input characters that includes any CR and LF codes.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script reads 4 groups of 4 characters each from the defaults file.
section.example: dim data(4) as C file_pointer = file.open("c:\a5\defaults.txt", FILE_RW_SHARED) for i = 1 TO 4 Data[i] = file_pointer.read(4) trace.writeln(data[i]) next i file_pointer.close()
